snippet: Franco Bernabè resigned as chief executive of Telecom Italia on Thursday after a dispute on how to reduce the company's debt load.
lead_paragraph: Franco Bernabè resigned as chief executive of Telecom Italia on Thursday after a dispute on how to reduce the company's debt load.

headline.main: Board Battle Leads to Exit of Telecom Italia Chief
headline.print_headline: Board Battle Leads to Exit of Telecom Italia Chief
